meanings.definition: A Korean alcoholic beverage typically made from rice or barley.
meanings.sent1: I tried some soju at the Korean restaurant.
meanings.sent2: She poured herself a glass of soju to enjoy with her meal.
meanings.sent3: The soju at the party disappeared faster than the snacks!
meanings.sent4: The soju flowed like a river at the celebration.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of soju filled the room, enticing everyone to take a sip.

meanings.sent1: The bartender served a shot of soju to the customer.
meanings.sent2: He mixed the soju with fruit juice for a refreshing cocktail.
meanings.sent3: The magician pulled a bottle of soju out of his hat!
meanings.sent4: Her laughter bubbled up like a glass of soju.
meanings.sent5: The soju sparkled in the sunlight, tempting all who passed by.
